meanings.sent1: The scroggier bushes made it hard to walk through the forest.
meanings.sent2: The abandoned lot was filled with scroggier plants than the park.
meanings.sent3: The scroggier vines seemed to be playing a game of tag with the trees.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was a scroggier mess than a bird's nest after a storm.
meanings.sent5: The scroggier undergrowth whispered secrets to the passing hikers.

meanings.definition: Having a more unkempt appearance than something else
meanings.sent1: His scroggier hair stood out in the class photo.
meanings.sent2: The old house looked even scroggier next to the newly painted one.
meanings.sent3: The scroggier garden gnome seemed to be winking at the neat row of flowers.
meanings.sent4: Her scroggier handwriting was like a spider dancing on the page.
meanings.sent5: The scroggier path led to a hidden treasure in the overgrown meadow.
